data.caption: Appointment
data.news_body: Latteys Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Appointment of Mr Ashish Singhal as Chief Financial Officer of the company w.e.f. January 24, 2026.

data.caption: Resignation
data.news_body: Latteys Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Resignation of Mr Sumit Goel as Chief Financial Officer of the company w.e.f. January 20, 2026.

data.descriptor: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018

data.news_body: Latteys Industries Limited has informed the Exchange about Bagging/Receiving of orders/contracts

data.news_body: Latteys Industries Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015
